sentence.Network_en: Her description of the nature and action of poisons is amazingly accurate.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对一些毒药的性质和作用的描述惊人地准确。

sentence.Network_en: She was an amazingly good cook.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是个厨艺精湛的厨师。

sentence.Network_en: Everyone seemed to her to be amazingly kind.
sentence.Network_cn: 每个人对她来说都善良得不可思议。

adj.(形容词)amazingly adv. 惊人地互动百科
simply terrific knit numBers at amazingly low prices .极为简单的针织衣衫以令人惊异的低价出售。
To call this CD amazingly satisfying is a gross understatement ., 称这张 CD 令人惊叹与满意只是一个保守说法.

list.abs: Saturn's job is to make you stronger , more seasoned and sharper , and he is amazingly effective .土星的职责就是使更强盛，更经验富厚，更出众，和他是有惊的作用的。
be in of the two amazingly quick inside week pull angel financing ., 并在两周内神速的拉到天使融资.
good times pass by amazingly quick ., 好时光过得总是特别快.
use layers and environmental setting to create amazingly realistic materials ., 使用层和环境设置 , 创造惊人的现实材料.
Your are an amazingly thoughtful , personable , supportive and caring person to your friends ., 您是位非常体贴 , 讨人喜欢 , 乐于助人和关心朋友的人.

entry.def: You say that something is amazing when it is very surprising and makes you feel pleasure, approval, or wonder.

example.ex: It's amazing what we can remember with a little prompting...
example.tran: 稍加提醒我们就能想起很多东西，真是让人惊奇。

example.ex: This movie has some of the most amazing stunts you're ever likely to see.
example.tran: 这部电影里有一些可能是你见所未见、让人惊叹的特技。

means.word_mean: 1. in an amazing manner; to everyone's surprise;

sentences.sentence: "amazingly, he finished medical school in three years"

auth_sentence.content: "So many people have been amazingly kind, some of which who never even knew Ben or Cath, " said Mr Meredith.

Sentence.sentence: Well, amazingly enough, the dolphins achieved a 100 % success rate.
